channel.title: Item help
channel.description: Hi I want to make some items so they can only be equiped if they have 50 pk points or more. How would I do that?

item.title: Item help
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

triger545:

Ok I will use that to build my delta server but I need to know how to do it for PI

it would be somewere around the same as that, they are both winterlove based.

the token however may be different, a token in simpler words in this situation, would be pkpoints, which is the token required at a certain amount.

so you just need to find what the token is for your pi, if you dont have a token that you want to use, just make one, then remake the command, would only need some touchups…

not the best with PI, but i think the pkpoints part would be p.pkpoints, or whatever the token is… or c.pkpoints, like i said, not the best with PI, hope i helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Item help
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

If using delta then open client.java and search:

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

and below that add:

if ((wearID == 35) && pkpoints <= 49) { sM("You need 50 PK points or more to use AGS."); return false; }
remember: your “pkpoints” int might be named differently, write it how it’s spelt in the character files where it records their points

Read full topic

item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

Config>Item.cgf

Then start coding item you want.

Sorry if this wasnt much help
